CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, p. 15, reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama. Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland...  9. Budweiser - Anheuser Busch, Inc.: William G. Porter, Cheryl Harris and Myren Stamps..."
TitMainTitle: William G. Porter, Cheryl Harris, and Myren Stamps posed in Budweiser - Anheuser Busch booth with picture of clydesdales in background, next to A.S.R. Products, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
